question:
Consider the following statements about the Indian core industries:
  1. Fertilizer industry is not a part of Indian core industries
  2. Electricity has the highest percentage weightage in IIP, among the core industries
  Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect because Fertilizer industry is a part of Indian core industries. The Eight Core Industries comprise nearly 38 % of the weight of items included in the Index of Industrial Production (IIP). Electricity has the highest percentage weightage in IIP, among the core industries. So second statement is also correct.
